com.aevi.helpers.services

Class AeviServiceConnection<T extends AeviService>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.helpers.services.AeviServiceConnection<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the concrete class of the AeviService the connection is linked to
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ServiceConnection

    public abstract class AeviServiceConnection<T extends AeviService>
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.content.ServiceConnection
    Base class for a service connection to an AeviService

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AeviServiceConnection(AeviServiceConnectionCallback connectionCallback)
      Initialize a new AeviServiceConnection.

      Called when a connection to the Service has been established, with the IBinder of the communication channel to the Service.
      void onServiceDisconnected(android.content.ComponentName name)

    • Constructor Detail

      • AeviServiceConnection

        public AeviServiceConnection(AeviServiceConnectionCallback connectionCallback)
        Initialize a new AeviServiceConnection.
        Parameters:
        connectionCallback - the connection callback. This parameter must not be null.

    • Method Detail

      • onServiceDisconnected

        public void onServiceDisconnected(android.content.ComponentName name)
        Called when a connection to the Service has been lost. This typically happens when the process hosting the service has crashed or been killed. This does not remove the ServiceConnection itself -- this binding to the service will remain active, and you will receive a call to onServiceConnected(android.content.ComponentName, android.os.IBinder) when the Service is next running.
        Specified by:
        onServiceDisconnected in interface android.content.ServiceConnection
        Parameters:
        name - The concrete component name of the service whose connection has been lost.

      • onServiceConnected

        public void onServiceConnected(android.content.ComponentName className,
                      android.os.IBinder boundService)
        Called when a connection to the Service has been established, with the IBinder of the communication channel to the Service.
        Specified by:
        onServiceConnected in interface android.content.ServiceConnection
        Parameters:
        className - The concrete component name of the service that has been connected.
        boundService - The IBinder of the Service's communication channel, which you can now make calls on.
